column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I was riding my bike home when I noticed that it had a flat tire .
#text=Lucky for me there was a hardware store near by .
#text=I walked in and purchased a patch kit .
#text=They loaned me a chanellock to get the tire off .
#text=It came off easy and I pulled the tire off the rim .
#text=It had a nail hole so I took the wire scrubber in the repair kit and scruffed up the rubber .
#text=I applied the risen and stuck on the patch , and I held thumb pressure on it for a few minutes .
#text=I started putting the tire back on the rim , which was easy I got it back on the bike .
#text=Lucky for me the hardware store had a portable tire air filler and I was able to fill the tire .
#text=I thanked them and finished my ride home and the tire did great .
